title: How do you make Fiddlesticks jungle work? I want to learn how to eat other people's elo
body:
I cannot for the life of me do well as him but whenever I have an enemy Fiddlesticks jungle, I have heart attacks and watch him stomp on everything.

Any tips and build paths? I am confused with how to play him, despite how everyone calls him easy, I find him hard, I find Lollipoppy APC jungle more easier than Fiddlesticks.

http://www.auplod.com/u/olpdua4a9cb.png
